FuncDef:
The fast-reroute command enables TE FRR.
The undo fast-reroute command disables TE FRR.
By default, TE FRR is disabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Enables bandwidth protection implemented by TE FRR.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
TE FRR is recommended for primary MPLS TE tunnels, which improves network reliability. To enable FRR, run the fast-reroute command in the P2P TE tunnel template view.
Prerequisites
A P2P TE tunnel template has been configured using the mpls te p2p-template command.
